description: This restaurant offers classic Italian dishes, focusing on traditional recipes.

menu.description: At Italian Restaurant, the main courses feature classic Italian flavors.

items.name: Lasagna
items.description: Traditional baked pasta with meat ragu, bechamel, and cheese
items.image_prompt: A delicious photo of lasagna, with layers of pasta, meat, and cheese, served at Italian Restaurant.

items.name: Tagliata Di Manzo
items.description: Sliced grilled steak with arugula, cherry tomatoes, and parmesan
items.image_prompt: A photo of Tagliata Di Manzo, sliced grilled steak with arugula and tomatoes, served at Italian Restaurant.

items.name: Risotto Ai Funghi
items.description: Creamy risotto with mixed wild mushrooms and parmesan
items.image_prompt: A photo of creamy risotto with mixed wild mushrooms and parmesan, served at Italian Restaurant.
